::Striker/Ramulus/Kluster/Rex/Smokescreen/The Cybertronian Fire::

A shot hits striker in the arm, the Maximal ducking under more shots that 
were heading for him. He jumps back up, inoring the pain as a laser catches 
him across the chest.

Striker turns toward Hell Beast. Seeing Hot Rod clear of the Predacon tyrant, 
Striker takes out his missile launcher, firing off a missile at Hell Beast.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Ramulus growls as shots hit him, finally ducking behind a boulder to avoid 
more. He jumps from behind the boulder, firing at Jackle.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Kluster ducks under a shot, several shots hitting him, noticing the battle 
between Hell Beast and Hot Rod. That was one brave Maximal there.

"Get to a CR chamber!" he yells to Hot Rod, also taking out a missile 
launcher, firing a missile at Gremlin.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Rex spins around as Serpentor's shots hit the massive Maximal in the back. He 
growls, bringing up his heavy-fire rifle and firing a few shots at Serpentor.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Smokescreen dodges Serpentor's shot. Jumping away from the newcomer and 
pulling out a charge, he throws it at Hell Beast.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
The Cybertronian Fire's missile launchers both swirl to aim at Hell Beast, 
firing off two energy-seeking missiles at him.

The laser bateries fire at their previous targets (Gremlin and Jackle).

The EMP cannons, once again recharged, take aim, firing at Hell Beast.

The shots fired by Unitron hit the shields, barely regestering on the energy 
readings.
